entry.title: 24" Dia Premium Shimmy Metallic Red Spandex Cocktail Table Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2254
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 12.38 - 140.78 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Cover
Material: Metallic Spandex
Color: Red
Style: 4-way Tight Stretchable Metallic Cover
GSM: 190

Cocktail Table Size Fits to:

  • Table Diameter: 24" (2ft)
  • Table Height: 30" to 40" (2.5ft-3ft)
A perfect fit for highboy 4-prong star base and folding cocktail tables
Water-Resistant Outer Fabric
Deep Foot Pockets: Perfect for keeping the table covers fitted and fixed
Features: 4 Ways Stretch, Opaque, Wrinkle Free, Durable and Reusable
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Hand Wash w/Mild Soap, Hang to Dry
  • Water-Resistant Outer, Inner (not water-resistant)
  • Usage: Suitable for cocktail tables at Wedding, Event, Party, hotel or Pub, coffee house and so on.

entry.title: White Round Spandex Cocktail Table Cover With Natural Wavy Drapes
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2254
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 20.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cocktail Table Cover
Material: Spandex
Color: White
Size: Fits up to 32" Round Cocktail Tables with 43" Height
Hemmed edges on the bottom.
On a Standard Cocktail Table, it drapes to the tip of the floor
Can also fit smaller size Cocktail Table with past floor length draping.
Features: Naturally drapes, loose fit, easy slip-on cover
How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Our Wavy Spandex Cocktail Table Cover design differs from other spandex table covers by providing a naturally draped base rather than a fitted slope.
    • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
    • Uses - Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: Blush | Rose Gold Cocktail Spandex Table Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 9.99 - 343.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cocktail Table Cover
Material: Spandex
Color: Blush | Rose Gold
Size: Fits a 24"-36" diameter (about 2 - 3ft) x 42" tall (3.5ft) Cocktail Table
Pleasing to the eyes and sensual to the touch, perfect for any cocktail or highboy tables all around.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Spandex, also known as Lycra is a wrinkle free stretchable material that expands effortlessly to adjust the size of the item you wish to drape. These stylish stretch spandex cocktail tablecloths display modern sophistication and affordable elegance. Create a perfectly bedazzling duet of luminosity and glamour by complementing these stylish spandex tablecloths with spandex chair covers and chair bands in cocktail parties, wedding, showers, banquet events, corporate affairs, quinceanera parties etc.

    These heavy duty tablecloths feature stain resistant and wrinkle resistant properties that make them a perfect choice for indoor and outdoor events, holiday parties, weddings and other festive celebrations where you desire to create an everlasting impression on your guests while still staying in budget.

    Our premium quality spandex cocktail Tablecloths are made from high quality four-way stretch spandex material that is highly durable, stretchable, and affordable. Our splendid stretchy spandex cocktail tablecloths can be used time and time again, without any need for ironing and can easily be laundered countless times without losing their luster and charm.

    Additional Information:

    • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
    • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
